name: Lost in Gunkanjima
description:
Do you want to play a game? Because you will have no choice.

Navigate through the darkness as you become "Lost in Gunkanjima"! With only a flashlight and your wits at your arsenal, explore the

abandoned school as you solve riddles in an abandoned school with no memories. Running out of the door is not an option. 

Face the challenge or become eaten by this world.

Developers:

Emerson Celestial

Aldrey Gaurana

Joseph Santos

Eryn Tallador
